trans-unit.source: Provides a model validator.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ModelBinding.DataAnnotationsModelValidator"></xref> class.
The metadata.
The execution context.
The validation attribute.
Gets the validation attribute for the model validator.
trans-unit.target: 获取模型验证程序的验证属性。

trans-unit.source: The validation attribute.
Gets the error message for a validation failure.
trans-unit.target: 获取验证失败的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The error message.
Gets a localized error message for the model.
trans-unit.target: 模型中获取本地化的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The error message to localize.
The localized version of the error message.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息的本地化的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets a localized version for a specific string.
trans-unit.target: 获取特定字符串的本地化的版本。

trans-unit.source: The string to localize.
An array of arguments.
The localized version of the string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的版本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the model is required (that is, whether the validation attribute in the <xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.DataAnnotationsModelValidator.Attribute*> property is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RequiredAttribute> attribute).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否需要模型 (即，是否验证属性中<xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.DataAnnotationsModelValidator.Attribute*>属性是<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RequiredAttribute>属性)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.RequiredAttribute> </xref:System.Web.ModelBinding.DataAnnotationsModelValidator.Attribute*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the model is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果模型是必需的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of validation error messages for the model.
trans-unit.target: 返回一份验证模型的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The container for the model.
The list of validation error messages, or an empty list if no errors are found.
trans-unit.target: 验证错误消息、 列表或一个空列表，如果未不发现任何错误。
